Key Match Events: Paul George suffered a hyperextension in his left knee during the second quarter of a preseason game against the Atlanta Hawks.
Post-Match Reflections: The 76ers' coach, Nick Nurse, expressed hope that George will recover soon, saying: 'Hopefully, he'll be okay, so he'll be back with us right away.'
Paul George tried to downplay the severity of the injury, saying: 'I felt it hyperextend, and immediately I knew I had to come out, but if you ask me, I'm not too worried about it.'
